metadata.subject: Trump urges Attorney General Sessions to stop Mueller probe 'right now'

relationships.description: Kahn is sending Epstein a news article about Trump and the Mueller probe
President urging Attorney General to stop investigation

analysis.purpose: To share breaking news about President Trump's public call to end the Mueller investigation
analysis.significance: Shows communication about significant political developments between Kahn and Epstein during the Mueller probe

notable_quotes: "Attorney General Jeff Sessions should stop this Rigged Witch Hunt right now"
"Bob Mueller is totally conflicted, and his 17 Angry Democrats that are doing his dirty work are a disgrace to USA!"

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present - this is simply sharing news content

illegal_activity.description: Document is sharing a CNBC news article about President Trump's public statements - no first-hand illegal activity discussed

details: Breaking news coverage of Trump's Twitter statements

public_knowledge.context: This refers to President Trump's very public Twitter statements about the Mueller investigation, which received widespread media coverage in 2018

analysis.summary: Richard Kahn emails Jeffrey Epstein a CNBC news article reporting on President Trump's Twitter call for Attorney General Sessions to immediately end the Mueller Russia investigation, which Trump characterized as a 'Rigged Witch Hunt.'
